parameters: Look at me! My lips are moving!
I'll sing something and you repeat after me!
No time to hesitate, go on and search the earth!
Zankoku na tenshi no you ni
Mune no DOA wo tataite mo Watashi,
Stop! Stop! I don't understand anything!
What Are You Singing? It's not Dragon Ball theme song!
It's Neon Genesis Evangelion Theme Song!
...ahh.... I have nothing to do today.
I'm so bored, please do something.
Tell me a joke. I want to hear something funny.
I'm not good at telling jokes. I am not a comedian...
Why did the chicken cross the road?
Yeah, yeah, very funny. Who cares why?
The chicken crossed the road to kick your ass!
My Disappointment Is Immeasurable And My Day Is Ruined!
You really think you hurted my feelings??
The answer is Yes! You hurted my feelings!!!
And you will pay the price! Grrrrr....
Move your mouse to test the Camera Mode.
